summary: Adds a Greybeard robe, hood, and boots to the game.
descriptionHtml:
[Update: I added a new version without the enchantment, as requested.]

This mod adds a Greybeard robe, hood, and boots to the game. They can be found at the entrance of High Hrothgar in front of the large chest. The robe has the same enchantment as the Amulet of Talos: reduce time between shouts by 20%, while the hood and boots remain unenchanted and enchantable.

I made this mod mainly for myself. I\'m aware that there are many other Greybeard robe mods, I just wanted a very simple mod for use with my Greybeard character. Hopefully this helps somebody out.

Sky above, voice within.
author: Icetroll64
